s: The most economical size of Mountain Mist Fiberloft fibre fill, this is a good purchase for a big project or regular crafter. I have used Mountain Mist pillow form fibre for projects needing a springy feel and lighter weight, but when I'm making many plush toys and sock animals, this is my "go-to" fill. It has a good weight and texture. The 3lb bag ensures I have a good supply and don't run out often. There are other brands ...
